mapper.select: select count(sales_order_entry_id) from e_sales_order_entry where creation_date = date('now', 'localtime')

select s.sales_order_entry_id, s.shipment_date, s.creation_date, s.total_amount, s.invoice_type, s.tax_rate, s.execution_status, s.drawer, s.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name as company_abbreviated_name, c.full_name as company_full_name, c.phone as company_phone, c.remark as company_remark, s.department_id, d.name as department_name, s.warehouse_id, w.name as warehouse_name, s.remark, s.is_modified from ((e_sales_order_entry as s join c_partner_company as c on s.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id) join e_department as d on s.department_id = d.department_id) join w_warehouse as w on s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id where s.partner_company_id = #{id} order by s.sales_order_entry_id desc

select sales_order_product_id, sales_order_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price from e_sales_order_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where sales_order_entry_id = #{id} order by sales_order_product_id
mapper.update: update e_sales_order_entry set total_amount = #{totalAmount}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, execution_status = #{executionStatus}, department_id = #{departmentID}, warehouse_id = #{warehouseID}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where sales_order_entry_id = #{salesOrderEntryID}

update e_sales_order_product set quantity = #{quantity}, remark = #{remark}, warehouse_stock_id = #{warehouseStockID}, warehouse_id = #{warehouseID}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, unit_price_without_tax = #{unitPriceWithoutTax}, unit_price_with_tax = #{unitPriceWithTax} where sales_order_product_id = #{salesOrderProductID}
